title: Delete obsolete .mycelium files
description: Delete: .mycelium/missions/, .mycelium/WORKFLOW.md, .mycelium/PROGRESS_TEMPLATE.yaml, and any other obsolete files. Keep only what's still used.

title: Merge CONTRACT.md useful parts into CLAUDE.md
description: Extract valuable rules from .mycelium/CONTRACT.md (non-negotiables, Python env, testing) and merge into CLAUDE.md. Delete CONTRACT.md after.

title: Create new WORKFLOW.md for Claude Code + beads
description: Copy out old WORKFLOW.md content, refactor to explain the new setup: Claude Code + beads integration, identity agents (scientist/implementer/verifier/maintainer), and orchestration flow between them.

title: Delete mycelium-validate skill
description: Remove .claude/skills/mycelium-validate/ - it validates the obsolete progress.yaml schema.

title: Create mycelium-next orchestration skill
description: New skill that reads bead's current_agent label and invokes the appropriate agent skill. Enables self-sequencing workflow.

title: Update skills to use beads current_agent label
description: Rewrite mycelium-scientist, mycelium-verifier, mycelium-maintainer skills to: 1) Read current_agent from bead label, 2) Update bead label on self-sequencing, 3) Remove progress.yaml references.

title: Integrate beads with mycelium agent workflow
description: Each bead should track its own current_agent (scientist/implementer/verifier/maintainer). Add: 1) current_agent field per bead, 2) SessionStart hook showing bd ready with agent states, 3) mycelium-next skill for self-sequencing. This unifies beads task tracking with mycelium's agent workflow.

title: Mycelium 2.0: Agentic Migration
description:
Migrate the Mycelium 'Human-Gated' workflow to Claude Code + Beads. 
  1. Port CONTRACT.md to CLAUDE.md.
  2. Map manual 'missions' to Beads tasks.
  3. Create Claude Skills for Scientist/Implementer roles.

title: Initialize CLAUDE.md with Mycelium Principles
description: Translate Mycelium CONTRACT.md into a project-wide CLAUDE.md file.

title: Automate 'mycelium next' as a Claude Skill
Port CONTRACT.md to CLAUDE.md
description: Translate global Mycelium rules into the project's 'Nervous System'. 1. Enforce 'Plan before code' by requiring /plan mode for all new missions. 2. Define the 'Stop Conditions' from the original contract as system-level instructions. 3. Explicitly list the Railway/Vercel stack as the project DNA.

title: Implement mycelium-onboard Skill
description: Create a Claude skill that runs 'bd onboard' and 'bd ready' to summarize current mission status immediately upon session start. This replaces the manual check of mission folders.

title: Migrate agents/ to CLI Skills
description: Move logic from .mycelium/agents/mission/*.md into executable Claude Skills in .claude/skills/. Port Scientist (planning), Verifier (DoD check), and Maintainer (cleanup) logic into native CLI tools.

title: YAML Schema Validation Engine
description: Implement a skill that validates progress.yaml against a JSON schema. Claude must fail the validation skill if 'definition_of_done' or 'commands_run' are missing before transitioning roles.

title: Beads-Git Hook Integration
description: Configure 'bd setup git' to ensure task progress is saved automatically with every commit. This replaces manual 'current_agent' text updates in YAML files.
